content.text: Several new features have been added to the eliza repository. A community manager feature was implemented in PR #4099. Additionally, a monorepo command was added to the CLI in PR #4112, enhancing the repository's command-line functionality.

Multiple bug fixes were implemented, including a fix for the settings action in PR #4085, a solution for duplicate tweet errors (Twitter error 187) in PR #4111, and improvements to the Twitter plugin post generation in PR #4108.

The codebase saw several maintenance improvements. The log level for null/undefined encryption/decryption errors was reduced in PR #4103. Component handling was improved to prevent unnecessary fetching when components aren't required or mounted in PR #4110. Documentation was also updated in PR #4104.
Testing and enhancement efforts included adding tests for each agent type in the-org package (PR #4090) and enhancing the Telegram plugin (PR #4098).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been made to the elizaOS/eliza repository, focusing on testing, documentation, feature additions, and bug fixes:

- Testing improvements: PR #4090 added tests for each agent type in the-org package, while PR #4100 resolved failing CLI testcases.

- Documentation and code quality: PR #4104 updated documentation, and PR #4110 improved component handling to prevent unnecessary fetching when components aren't required or mounted.

- New features: PR #4099 introduced a community manager feature, and PR #4112 added a monorepo command to the CLI.

- Bug fixes: PR #4108 fixed Twitter plugin post generation and ran the linter, while PR #4106 addressed issues with the Telegram plugin.

These contributions demonstrate ongoing development and maintenance efforts across various aspects of the Eliza project.

Several users are experiencing dependency issues with ElizaOS installation. Issues #4101 and #4109 report the same error: 'Cannot find dependency @elizaos/plugin-sql@^0.25.6'. This appears to be a significant installation blocker for multiple users.
Issue #4107 reports an error during project creation with 'npx elizaos create', where the system reports 'agents already exists', preventing users from setting up new projects.

There are also functionality issues being reported. Issue #4102 describes problems with Twitter integration, specifically not getting links and hashtags in Twitter posts. Related to this, Issue #4097 questions whether the 'ENABLE_TWITTER_POST_GENERATION' feature is still being used.

Over the two-day period from March 28-30, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository showed consistent development activity. Each day saw 5 new pull requests, all of which were successfully merged. The repository also received 3 new issues per day. The project maintained strong contributor engagement with 10 active contributors on the first day, decreasing slightly to 7 active contributors on the second day.
sources: From 2025-03-28 to 2025-03-29, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (5 merged), 3 new issues, and 10 active contributors.
From 2025-03-29 to 2025-03-30, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (5 merged), 3 new issues, and 7 active contributors.
